items.title: Save up to $500 on Aventon’s three popular legacy e-bikes, like the Aventure 2 all-terrain commuter at $1,499
items.summary:
While Aventon may have ended its previous New Year Sale across its entire lineup of e-bikes, the brand is continuing discounts on three of its popular legacy models, like the Aventure 2 All-Terrain e-bike at $1,499 shipped. Normally going for $1,999 outside of sales/discounts, we mostly saw this model kept down at $1,599 throughout most of 2025, with late August being the first time that year that it dipped lower to this rate, which it regularly returned to since. If you missed out or aren’t looking to spend more on the newer smart counterpart, you’re looking at a $500 markdown here to the best price we have tracked over the last year – plus, it beats out 2024’s Black Friday and Christmas pricing while matching the prices we saw in 2025’s seasonal events. Head below to check out the other legacy deals while they are still around.

Carrying a $599 MSRP, though usually starting lower at $529 at other marketplaces like Amazon, we’ve been seeing it regularly marked down between $349 and $339 with discounts since October, with this rate only beaten by the $315 and $299 prices that popped up during Black Friday and Christmas sales. While this current sale continues, you’ll be getting $207 off the going rate ($277 off the MSRP) for the third-lowest price we have tracked. Running parallel to the short-term CGO800S and AGO X flash sale lows, Tenways is continuing its December holiday deal on the new Wayfarer Cruiser e-bike with $366 in FREE gear at $1,899 shipped for an unknown time longer. This all-new commuter only just released at the end of October, when we saw a $300 launch discount from its $2,199 tag price and only getting a $277 bundle that included mudguards, a kickstand, and a rear carrier. This bundle deal, which happens to be an extended best so far during its time on the market, gives you an additional larger pannier bag on top of that previously mentioned gear and discounts, keeping things at the all-time lowest price we have tracked and the best bundle to date – all so you can score the most to start off the new year strong.

This undercuts its previous all-time low from last year’s Labor Day sale by $2. While that earlier deal included a $30 digital credit, today’s offer delivers a better straight cash discount, making it the more compelling option if you’re looking to simply save some cash on your purchase. items.title: Keep teeth shining throughout 2026 and beyond with Oral-B’s iO Deep Clean Series 3 electric toothbrush at $60
items.summary:
Oral-B iO Deep Clean Series 3 Limited Electric Toothbrush w/ 2 Brush Heads + Travel Case

Buy for $60 (Reg. $110)

What we love

With a New Year comes a new you, and what better way to emphasize such than with a smarter means to maintain your pearly whites? By upgrading to this iO Deep Clean Series 3 e-toothbrush, you’ll be gaining three different cleaning modes, pressure sensors that alert you when not applying enough pressure (or too much), as well as a 2-minute timer so you’re doing the proper recommended amount of cleaning. What’s more, you’re getting two starter brush heads – with the device alerting you when they need replacing – as well as a travel case.

CES 2026 – the biggest tech event of the year is now in full swing on the strip in Las Vegas with a countless number of new product reveals and wild new concepts. From desktop hologram machines and the new smart LEGO bricks, chargers that turn your phone into an AI robot assistant, the latest e-bikes, solar-powered gazebos, smart goggles, and the latest in electric vehicle tech, CES knows no bounds. items.title: iGarden expands ‘artful living’ motto at CES 2026 with new flagship robot pool cleaner, lawn mower, and aquatic fitness trainer
items.summary:
CES 2026 is in full swing, and we’ve already seen a stunning array of new innovations across a multitude of technologies. Among the many companies revealing their latest upgrades, iGarden, a brand that prides itself on “artful living technology,” has unveiled quite a lineup of new additions, including a trust-centered AI ecosystem, as well as three new flagship products – a pool cleaning robot, an aquatic fitness trainer, and even a new series of robot lawn mowers. Outdoor living has been becoming the latest frontier for smart home integrations in recent years, and iGarden is aiming to position itself at the forefront of this frontier with these next-gen robotics.
